select to_char(d.cnt_date,'MM-DD') as cnt_date, nvl(e.seoul,0) as Seoul, nvl(e.busan,0) as Busan, nvl(e.jeju,0) as Jeju from (select to_date(#{statsSearchStartDate})+level-1 as cnt_date from DUAL
connect by level <= (to_date(#{statsSearchEndDate}) - to_date(#{statsSearchStartDate})+1)) d,
(select to_char(h.cnt_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as cnt_date, count(decode(c.c_adress, 'Seoul', 1, null)) seoul, count(decode(c.c_adress, 'Busan', 1, null)) busan, count(decode(c.c_adress, 'Jeju', 1, null)) jeju from customer c, hitcount h, shoppingmall s where c.c_num = h.c_num and h.s_num = s.s_num and s.s_sname = '%#{s_sname}%' group by to_char(h.cnt_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')) e where d.cnt_date = e.cnt_date(+) order by d.cnt_date

select to_char(d.cnt_date,'MM-DD') as cnt_date, nvl(e.f,0) as female, nvl(e.m,0) as male from (select to_date(#{statsSearchStartDate})+level-1 as cnt_date from DUAL
connect by level <= (to_date(#{statsSearchEndDate}) - to_date(#{statsSearchStartDate})+1)) d,
(select to_char(h.cnt_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cnt_date, count(decode(c.c_gender, 'woman', 1, null)) F, count(decode(c.c_gender, 'man', 1, null)) M from customer c, hitcount h, shoppingmall s where c.c_num = h.c_num and h.s_num = s.s_num and s.s_sname like '%'||#{s_sname}||'%' group by to_char(h.cnt_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) e where d.cnt_date = e.cnt_date(+) order by d.cnt_date

select to_char(d.cnt_date,'MM-DD') as cnt_date, nvl(e.teen,0) as teen, nvl(e.twenty,0) as twenty, nvl(e.thirty,0) as thirty from (select to_date(#{statsSearchStartDate})+level-1 as cnt_date from DUAL
connect by level <= (to_date(#{statsSearchEndDate}) - to_date(#{statsSearchStartDate})+1)) d,
(select to_char(h.cnt_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cnt_date, count(decode(trunc((nvl(TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate, TO_DATE(c_birth,'yyyy-MM-dd'))/12), 0)+1),-1),'10',1,null)) teen, count(decode(trunc((nvl(TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate, TO_DATE(c_birth,'yyyy-MM-dd'))/12), 0)+1),-1),'20',1,null)) twenty, count(decode(trunc((nvl(TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate, TO_DATE(c_birth,'yyyy-MM-dd'))/12), 0)+1),-1),'30',1,null)) thirty from customer c, hitcount h, shoppingmall s where c.c_num = h.c_num and s.s_num = h.s_num and s.s_sname like '%'||#{s_sname}||'%' group by to_char(h.cnt_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by to_char(h.cnt_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) e where d.cnt_date = e.cnt_date(+) order by d.cnt_date
